description.p: Tarantool is tolerant of write-heavy loads. It also allows keeping full-featured applications close to the data, thus reducing data access network latency to zero. Large enterprises have demanding requirements for information safety and security. Besides modules for integrating with the company's existing technological suite, Tarantool Enterprise Edition provides tools for administration, deployment, and security management. This edition is more predictable in terms of solution cost and maintenance. For Enterprise Edition users, premium support is available 24/7.
